attributes.action: hold an immediate General Election on the grounds that he and his government have lost the confidence of the electorate and are no longer fit for purpose.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is reflected in the strong public opposition to the signing of the Treaty of Lisbon (EU Constitution in different wrapping), and outrage at Govt refusal to hold the promised referendum, accusations of incompetence over the Northern Rock affair, strong public and business opposition to Home Information Packs to name but 3. The PM must do the honourable thing as above.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
